parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.12

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the current state of a [[CT_CHECKBOX]] control. Use <tt>"CheckedChanged"</tt> control event handler with it.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''cbSetChecked''' state

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control : [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> state : [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_myCheckBox [[cbSetChecked]] [[true]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_disp = [[findDisplay]] 46 [[createDisplay]] "RscDisplayEmpty";
_chk = _disp [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscCheckBox", -1];
_chk [[cbSetChecked]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[cbChecked]], [[ctrlSetChecked]], [[ctrlChecked]]
</value></part></template></root>
